title: Miniature geranium in a ceramic pot for 1:12 scale dollhouse decoration
description: Add a touch of cozy charm to your dollhouse with this handcrafted 1:12 scale miniature geranium in a ceramic pot. Each stem, leaf, and flower is individually sculpted, hand-painted, and securely fixed inside the pot to create a lush, full plant that stays perfectly in place. The geranium is permanently attached to the pot and cannot be removed, making it a stable, ready-to-display accent for your dollhouse living room, sunny kitchen, garden scene, fairy corner, or miniatureâ€¦
